verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w afterward|strong="G2517"\w*, \w that|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* went \w throughout|strong="G1353"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w village|strong="G2968"\w*, \w preaching|strong="G2784"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shewing the glad \w tidings|strong="G2097"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \add were\add* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* had \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*, \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w*, out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Joanna|strong="G2489"\w* the \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* of \w Chuza|strong="G5529"\w* \w Herod’s|strong="G2264"\w* \w steward|strong="G2012"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Susanna|strong="G4677"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w others|strong="G2087"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w ministered|strong="G1247"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w substance|strong="G5224"\w*.

¶ And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="G4896"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w come|strong="G1975"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out of \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, he \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* a \w parable|strong="G3850"\w*:

\wj  \+w A sower|strong="G4687"\+w* \+w went out|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w to sow|strong="G4687"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w seed|strong="G4703"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w sowed|strong="G4687"\+w*, \+w some|strong="G3303"\+w* \+w fell|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w by|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w the way side|strong="G3598"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it was trodden down|strong="G2662"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the fowls|strong="G4071"\+w* \+w of the air|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w devoured|strong="G2719"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w some|strong="G2087"\+w* \+w fell|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w upon|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w a rock|strong="G4073"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as soon as it was sprung up|strong="G5453"\+w*, \+w it withered away|strong="G3583"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w it|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w lacked|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w moisture|strong="G2429"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w some|strong="G2087"\+w* \+w fell|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w among|strong="G3319"\+w* \+w thorns|strong="G0173"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the thorns|strong="G0173"\+w* \+w sprang up with it|strong="G4855"\+w*, \+w and choked|strong="G0638"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w other|strong="G2087"\+w* \+w fell|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w* \+w ground|strong="G1093"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sprang up|strong="G5453"\+w*, \+w and bare|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w an hundredfold|strong="G1542"\+w*.\wj* And when he had \w said|strong="G3004"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, he \w cried|strong="G5455"\w*, \wj  \+w He that hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w ears|strong="G3775"\+w* \+w to hear|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w let him hear|strong="G0191"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w might|strong="G1498"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w parable|strong="G3850"\w* \w be|strong="G1498"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w it is given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w to know|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w the mysteries|strong="G3466"\+w* \+w of the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w to others|strong="G3062"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w parables|strong="G3850"\+w*; \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w seeing|strong="G0991"\+w* \+w they might|strong="G0991"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w see|strong="G0991"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w hearing|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w they might|strong="G4920"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w understand|strong="G4920"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Now|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the parable|strong="G3850"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w*: \+w The seed|strong="G4703"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the word|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Those|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w by|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w the way side|strong="G3598"\+w* \+w are they|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w hear|strong="G0191"\+w*; \+w then|strong="G1534"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w the devil|strong="G1228"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w taketh away|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w the word|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w out of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w their|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w hearts|strong="G2588"\+w*, \+w lest|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w they should believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w and be saved|strong="G4982"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w They|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the rock|strong="G4073"\+w* \+add are they\+add*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w they hear|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w receive|strong="G1209"\+w* \+w the word|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w joy|strong="G5479"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w these|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w root|strong="G4491"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w for|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w a while|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w time|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w of temptation|strong="G3986"\+w* \+w fall away|strong="G0868"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w which fell|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w among|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w thorns|strong="G0173"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w they|strong="G3778"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w when they have heard|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w go forth|strong="G4198"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w are choked|strong="G4846"\+w* \+w with|strong="G5259"\+w* \+w cares|strong="G3308"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w riches|strong="G4149"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w pleasures|strong="G2237"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0979"\+w* \+add this\+add* \+w life|strong="G0979"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w bring|strong="G5052"\+w* \+w no fruit|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w to perfection|strong="G5052"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the good|strong="G2570"\+w* \+w ground|strong="G1093"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w they|strong="G3778"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3748"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w an honest|strong="G0018"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w good|strong="G2570"\+w* \+w heart|strong="G2588"\+w*, \+w having heard|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w the word|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+w keep|strong="G2722"\+w* \+add it\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w bring forth fruit|strong="G2592"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w patience|strong="G5281"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w No man|strong="G3762"\+w*, \+w when he hath lighted|strong="G0681"\+w* \+w a candle|strong="G3088"\+w*, \+w covereth|strong="G2572"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w with a vessel|strong="G4632"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w putteth|strong="G5087"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w under|strong="G5270"\+w* \+w a bed|strong="G2825"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w setteth|strong="G2007"\+w* \+add it\+add* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w a candlestick|strong="G3087"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w they which enter in|strong="G1531"\+w* \+w may see|strong="G0991"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w secret|strong="G2927"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w be made|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w manifest|strong="G5318"\+w*; \+w neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+add any thing\+add* \+w hid|strong="G0614"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w be known|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w abroad|strong="G5318"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Take heed|strong="G0991"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w how|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w ye hear|strong="G0191"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w*, \+w to him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w shall be given|strong="G1325"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whosoever|strong="G0302"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*, \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w shall be taken|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w which he seemeth|strong="G1380"\+w* \+w to have|strong="G2192"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add his\add* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w come|strong="G4940"\w* at \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w press|strong="G3793"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add by certain\add* which \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w*, \w desiring|strong="G2309"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w My|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w brethren|strong="G0080"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w these|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w hear|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w the word|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Now|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* a \w certain|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w that|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G1684"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Let us go over|strong="G1330"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the other side|strong="G4008"\+w* \+w of the lake|strong="G3041"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they launched \w forth|strong="G0321"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* as \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w sailed|strong="G4126"\w* he fell \w asleep|strong="G0879"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there came \w down|strong="G2597"\w* a \w storm|strong="G2978"\w* of \w wind|strong="G0417"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w lake|strong="G3041"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w filled|strong="G4845"\w* \add with water\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were in \w jeopardy|strong="G2793"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they came to \w him|strong="G4334"\w*, and \w awoke|strong="G1326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1988"\w*, \w master|strong="G1988"\w*, we \w perish|strong="G0622"\w*. \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* he \w arose|strong="G1453"\w*, and \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* the \w wind|strong="G0417"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w raging|strong="G2830"\w* of the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w ceased|strong="G3973"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w calm|strong="G1055"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Where|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w*?\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they being \w afrai|strong="G5399"\w*d \w wondered|strong="G2296"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* manner of \w man|strong="G0687"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*! \w for|strong="G3754"\w* he \w commandeth|strong="G2004"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* the \w winds|strong="G0417"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w arrived|strong="G2668"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* the \w country|strong="G5561"\w* of the \w Gadarenes|strong="G1046"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* over \w against|strong="G0495"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1831"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w forth|strong="G1909"\w* to \w land|strong="G1093"\w*, there \w met|strong="G5221"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w* \w long|strong="G2425"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ware|strong="G1737"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w abode|strong="G3306"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add any\add* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w tombs|strong="G3418"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, he cried \w out|strong="G0349"\w*, and fell \w down|strong="G4363"\w* before \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* with a \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* have \w I|strong="G1698"\w* to \w do|strong="G2532"\w* with \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \add thou\add* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* most \w high|strong="G5310"\w*? I \w beseech|strong="G1189"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w torment|strong="G0928"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he had \w commanded|strong="G3853"\w* the \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* to come \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w oftentimes|strong="G5550"\w* it had \w caught|strong="G4884"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w kept|strong="G5442"\w* \w bound|strong="G1196"\w* with \w chains|strong="G0254"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in \w fetters|strong="G3976"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w brake|strong="G1284"\w* the \w bands|strong="G1199"\w*, and was \w driven|strong="G1643"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1142"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*.)

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w*?\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Legion|strong="G3003"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w* were \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he \w would|strong="G2004"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w command|strong="G2004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* to go \w out|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w deep|strong="G0012"\w*.
